nodes.course_info:
SLVN 404 Second-Year Slovene Language (3/5)
Reinforces and expands foundational knowledge of Slovene language through grammatical topics and exercises, reading of authentic texts, composition, listening, oral presentations, and conversation.

SLVN 406 Second-Year Slovene Language II (3-5) VLPA
Consolidates knowledge of Slovene language through advanced grammatical topics, exercises, reading, composition, listening, and conversation.

SLVN 401 Introductory Slovene Language (3/5)
Introduction to spoken and written Slovene language. First in a two course sequence.

SLVN 499 Directed Study in Slovene (1-5, max. 15) Biggins
Individual study of topics in Slovene culture, linguistics, or current affairs to meet specific needs, based primarily on readings of undapated Slovene texts. Offered: AWSp.
View course details in MyPlan: SLVN 499

SLVN 402 Introductory Slovene Language (3/5)
Introduction to spoken and written Slovene language. Second in a two course sequence.
